roasts.name: Thaddeus Espresso
roasts.tasting_notes: Perfectly Fine Espresso. Nice balance of caramel and sweetness, I need to fiddle more with my settings to stretch it out and find what's hiding in the shot. I think I taste some earthy Indonesia in there. It is not yet my favorite, lacking the touch of burnt caramel I find in my all-time favorites, but it's very drinkable, great body, and tastes great at a variety of settings.

roasts.name: Java Frinsa Collective
roasts.tasting_notes: Solid boomy bass noted Java. Earthy, chocolatey, heavy duty. No-nonsense great coffee. Great for drinking While Doing Something.

roasts.name: Zambia Northern Lights
roasts.tasting_notes: Bright but balanced. Not as juice-forward as I was expecting, and that's fine! The juice is in the finish, a pleasant reminder that I just downed a mouthful of full bodied, expertly roasted deliciousness.
